CustomField.formula: CASE(STATUSREASON__c, 0, '000 Retain-No Reason Specified', 1, '001 Retain-Lost', 2, '002 Retain-Stolen', 3, '003 Retain-Fraud', 4, '004 Retain-Permanent Restraint', 5, '005 Retain-Bad Debt', 6, '006 Retain-Checking Dormant', 7, '007 Retain-Checking Closed', 8, '008 Retain-Checking NSF', 9, '009 Retain-Bankruptcy', 10, '010 Retain-Marital Problems', 11, '011 Retain-Deceased', 12, '012 Retain-Collection', 13, '013 Retain-Collection (Skip)', 14, '014 Retain-Collection (Legal Pursuit)', 15, '015 Retain-Closed for Cause', 16, '016 Retain-Closed per Cardholder', 17, '017 Retain-Closed (Duplicate)', 18, '018 Retain-Chargeoff', 19, '019 Retain-Excessive PIN Retries', 20, '020 Retain-Requested by Network', 100, '100 Return-No Reason Specified', 101, '101 Return-Lost', 102, '102 Return-Stolen', 103, '103 Return-Fraud', 104, '104 Return-Permanent Restraint', 105, '105 Return-Bad Debt', 106, '106 Return-Checking Dormant', 107, '107 Return-Checking Closed', 108, '108 Return-Checking NSF', 109, '109 Return-Bankruptcy', 110, '110 Return-Marital Problems', 111, '111 Return-Deceased', 112, '112 Return-Collection', 113, '113 Return-Collection (Skip)', 114, '114 Return-Collection (Legal Pursuit)', 115, '115 Return-Closed for Cause', 116, '116 Return-Closed per Cardholder', 117, '117 Return-Closed (Duplicate)', 118, '118 Return-Chargeoff', 119, '119 Return-Excessive PIN Retries', 120, '120 Return-Requested by Network', '')
CustomField.label: Status Reason
